name: CU Reviews
description: CU Reviews is a course review website. You can browse classes and view their metrics, read about other students' experiences, and submit your own course reviews for others.

name: CoursePlan
description: CoursePlan is a visual scheduling tool designed to help Cornell students easily plan their courses each semester, check for conflicts, and share their schedules.

imageAlt: Screenshot of Queue Me In app
name: Queue Me In
description: Queue Me In simplifies office hour queues. Students can join virtual queues, track their position, and receive notifications when it's their turn.

imageAlt: Screenshot of Design at Cornell website
name: Design at Cornell
description: Design at Cornell is an interactive resource that connects students interested in design with clubs, classes, and events across the Cornell community.

name: Zing
description: Zing streamlines dining on campus by allowing Cornell students to quickly order ahead at campus eateries and avoid long waits.

imageAlt: Screenshot preview of CU Apts housing platform
name: CU Apts
description: CU Apts helps Cornell students find off-campus housing easily. Browse listings, filter options, and read reviews from fellow students.

imageAlt: Screenshot preview of Carriage ridesharing service
name: Carriage
description: Carriage is a ridesharing platform tailored for the Cornell community, enabling safe, affordable, and convenient transportation around Ithaca.

imageAlt: Screenshot preview of CornellGO campus navigation app
name: CornellGO
description: CornellGO provides real-time navigation, event discovery, and campus resource mapping for students navigating Cornell's expansive campus.
